# Azure Synapse Analytics
Azure Synapse Analytics is an integrated analytics platform that brings together data integration, enterprise data warehousing, big data analytics and visualization into a single service. Azure Synapse Analytics is an evolution of Azure SQL Data Warehouse.

![Azure Synatpse Analytics](../images/azure-synapse-analytics.png){.center .image-large}

- Modern data warehousing.
- Advanced analytics.
- Data exploration and discovery.
- Real-time analytics.
- Data integration.
- Integrated analytics.
- Machine Learning.

# Components of Azure Synapse Analytics

![Azure Synatpse Analytics Components](../images/azure-synapse-analytics-components.png){.center .image-large}

Components:

- Synapse SQL pool.
- Synapse Spark pool.
- Synapse Pipelines.
- Synapse Link.
- Synapse Studio.
